name: hlibBladeRF
body:
### SDR with Haskell via BladeRF
This is a Haskell binding to the libBladeRF C library. The intent here is to allow developement of Software Defined Radio (SDR) applications in our favorite functional prgramming language.

### Example programs
There are some example programs that interact with the BladeRF SDR written in Haskell that make use of this binding in the examples/ directory.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Please file issues found! Pull requests warmly welcomed !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
